articles.title: What is driveMybox?
articles.description: driveMybox is a digital all-in-one platform for container transport by road based in Hamburg, Germany.
articles.desc_un_html: driveMybox is a digital all-in-one platform for container transport by road based in Hamburg, Germany.

articles.title: What advantages does driveMybox offer me?
articles.description:
1. integrated navigation:  

Thanks to the integrated navigation, trips from start to destination are more convenient and faster.

2. Simple order management:

Let a self-explanatory order workflow guide you. Just take care of the ride, generate more revenue and we'll take care of everything else for you.

Dashboard:

Plan and actual data at a glance. Determine the number of your tours and sales for the future and past.

4. availability and order area:

Drive when and where you want. Based on your time window and area of activity, suitable tours are offered to you.


5. notifications and support:

Automatic notifications keep you up-to-date at all times. By the way: You can reach our support via chat or phone.

6. troubleshooting:

Report inconsistencies at the loading point, damages of all kinds and unforeseeable traffic situations at the push of a button. The information is directly forwarded and documented.

To see all the benefits, click here.

articles.title: Where do I register?
articles.description:

(Link playstore / appstore/ website)

articles.title: What requirements and documents do I need for registration?
articles.description:
For the registration you need the following documents:
  • Valid identity card (front and back)
  • Valid driver's license (front and back)
  • Goods damage liability insurance 
  • Business liability insurance 
  • Extract from the commercial register 
  • License according to freight traffic law 
  • Motor vehicle insurance (with own truck and chassis)
The files can be uploaded as a scan or you simply take a picture of them during registration.
It is important that all required data are clearly visible, because the documents have to be checked by us.
The documents should have the following format: PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, JPEG, PNG.

Special conditions apply to the following documents:

  • Valid identity card (front and back).
    a) color image (8000 x 8000 pixels or smaller)
    b) file size 10 MB or less
    c) JPG or PNG format (no PDF!)
    d) The name on the ID card must match the name on the registration.
    e) Country of issue must be the same as the company's registered office.
    f) Validity date must be after the registration date.
     
  • Extract from the Commercial Register
    a) color image (8000 x 8000 pixels or smaller)
    b) file size 10 MB or less
    c) JPG or PNG format (no PDF!)
    d) The company data in the commercial register excerpt (e.g. the address or VAT number) must be identical to the data specified in the registration process
    e) Validity date must be after the registration date.
articles.desc_un_html: For the registration you need the following documents:    Valid identity card (front and back)    Valid driver's license (front and back)    Goods damage liability insurance     Business liability insurance     Extract from the commercial register     License according to freight traffic law     Motor vehicle insurance (with own truck and chassis)    The files can be uploaded as a scan or you simply take a picture of them during registration. It is important that all required data are clearly visible, because the documents have to be checked by us.  The documents should have the following format: PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, JPEG, PNG.     Special conditions apply to the following documents:      Valid identity card (front and back). a) color image (8000 x 8000 pixels or smaller) b) file size 10 MB or less c) JPG or PNG format (no PDF!) d) The name on the ID card must match the name on the registration. e) Country of issue must be the same as the company's registered office. f) Validity date must be after the registration date.      Extract from the Commercial Register a) color image (8000 x 8000 pixels or smaller) b) file size 10 MB or less c) JPG or PNG format (no PDF!) d) The company data in the commercial register excerpt (e.g. the address or VAT number) must be identical to the data specified in the registration process e) Validity date must be after the registration date.

articles.title: How do I get feedback if my registration was successful?
articles.description:
After a successful registration you will receive a message that you have successfully registered.

You will immediately be in your newly created account. 


ATTENTION: Before you can accept your first order, we have to check your registration and your documents. You will receive feedback from us when your account is activated.
articles.desc_un_html: After a successful registration you will receive a message that you have successfully registered.  You will immediately be in your newly created account.      ATTENTION: Before you can accept your first order, we have to check your registration and your documents. You will receive feedback from us when your account is activated.

articles.title: When will my account be activated?
articles.description:
In order for you to accept your first order, we must first verify your registration and documents.  

We will try to complete this process as soon as possible. Please note that this process can take up to two business days.  

You will receive an email from us when the verification has been successful and your account has been activated.

Please note that this process can take up to two business days.    You will receive an email from us when the verification has been successful and your account has been activated.

articles.description:
You can reset your password here.

When you click on "Save", the new password will be assigned and you can log in again.

articles.title: I uploaded the wrong document, can I change it?
articles.description:
During registration, you can go back to point 4/5 and simply replace or re-upload documents.

After registration, you can delete the wrong documents in your settings under the item Documents and upload them again. Here you can also maintain your documents at any time and keep up to date, should documents expire.

all_folders.description: Info on order processing for self-employed companies

articles.title: How do I receive orders via driveMybox?
articles.description:
You will receive offers automatically from us. 

You only have to enter your catchment area and your working hours and we will plan for you. 

Based on your skills and information, we will look for customized jobs for you. 

You only have to decide which job you want to drive.
articles.desc_un_html: You will receive offers automatically from us.   You only have to enter your catchment area and your working hours and we will plan for you.   Based on your skills and information, we will look for customized jobs for you.   You only have to decide which job you want to drive.

articles.title: How do I get transportation outside my catchment area?
articles.description:
You can enter an "additional catchment area". 

If you are traveling outside your usual catchment area on some days, you can always specify when you are where in order to be supplied with orders from us there as well.
articles.desc_un_html: You can enter an "additional catchment area".   If you are traveling outside your usual catchment area on some days, you can always specify when you are where in order to be supplied with orders from us there as well.

articles.title: What transports are offered through driveMybox?
articles.description: Via driveMybox container transportation by road is offered.
articles.desc_un_html: Via driveMybox container transportation by road is offered.

articles.title: Do I have to prepare a waybill?
articles.description:
No, we take care of that for you. 

The waybill is automatically created by us and made available to you digitally.
articles.desc_un_html: No, we take care of that for you.   The waybill is automatically created by us and made available to you digitally.

articles.title: Can I also handle my transports in a climate-neutral way?
articles.description: Climate compensation is offered for all our transports, offsetting CO2 emissions.
articles.desc_un_html: Climate compensation is offered for all our transports, offsetting CO2 emissions.

articles.title: How is the transport price determined?
articles.description:
The amount of remuneration for the provision of transport and logistics services is determined according to a dynamic pricing algorithm, which takes into account the following parameters, among others: 

   

- Distance-dependent remuneration 

- Energy price developments 

- Supply and demand situation  

- Charges related to handling bottlenecks 

- Toll charges
articles.desc_un_html: The amount of remuneration for the provision of transport and logistics services is determined according to a dynamic pricing algorithm, which takes into account the following parameters, among others:        - Distance-dependent remuneration   - Energy price developments   - Supply and demand situation    - Charges related to handling bottlenecks   - Toll charges

articles.title: How far in advance can I accept orders?
articles.description:
You can theoretically plan your work week in advance. 

Through the information we collect at the loading points and ramps, we can predict the exact processing times for an order. 

Thus, you have the possibility to book follow-up tours without much risk.
articles.desc_un_html: You can theoretically plan your work week in advance.   Through the information we collect at the loading points and ramps, we can predict the exact processing times for an order.   Thus, you have the possibility to book follow-up tours without much risk.

articles.title: Who places the orders?
articles.description:
The orders are placed by the clients registered with us. 

All principals are checked by us to ensure a high level of quality. 

 

Principals can be forwarders, shipping companies, intermodal services, wholesalers and shippers.
articles.desc_un_html: The orders are placed by the clients registered with us.   All principals are checked by us to ensure a high level of quality.      Principals can be forwarders, shipping companies, intermodal services, wholesalers and shippers.

articles.title: How is the performance of the charging points determined?
articles.description:
By digitally recording the orders, we can determine the exact waiting times. 

From registration to the end of loading/unloading, it is possible to tell you in advance whether you have to plan for waiting time on an order.
articles.desc_un_html: By digitally recording the orders, we can determine the exact waiting times.   From registration to the end of loading/unloading, it is possible to tell you in advance whether you have to plan for waiting time on an order.

articles.title: How do I benefit from evaluating shippers and loading points?
articles.description:
Through the ratings, you have a better overview of whether a loading point performs well or not. 

You will also get information on how you are treated at the loading point. 

 

In addition, you get information about the facilities on site, such as:

 

- Can I take my break and stay overnight on site? 

- Are there sanitary facilities available? 

- Can I get a coffee or something to eat on site?  

 

Based on these values, you can decide for yourself whether you want to drive the job or not.
articles.desc_un_html: Through the ratings, you have a better overview of whether a loading point performs well or not.   You will also get information on how you are treated at the loading point.      In addition, you get information about the facilities on site, such as:     - Can I take my break and stay overnight on site?   - Are there sanitary facilities available?   - Can I get a coffee or something to eat on site?       Based on these values, you can decide for yourself whether you want to drive the job or not.

articles.title: How does the handling of the transports work?
articles.description:
Once you have accepted an order, it will end up in your schedule. 

To start an order, simply click on the order and select "start trip". 

The navigation device starts automatically and navigates you to the first charging point. 

All further steps are self-explanatory and can be done with just a few clicks.


If you still have any questions, please feel free to contact us via the contact form or chat.
articles.desc_un_html: Once you have accepted an order, it will end up in your schedule.   To start an order, simply click on the order and select "start trip".   The navigation device starts automatically and navigates you to the first charging point.   All further steps are self-explanatory and can be done with just a few clicks.     If you still have any questions, please feel free to contact us via the contact form or chat.

articles.title: How does the integrated navigation device work?
articles.description:
The navigation device works with daily updated maps that are specially designed for truck driving. 

Driving bans, bridges, closures and other restrictions are taken into account. 

In addition, the navigation device predicts the exact time of arrival - taking into account traffic jams and possible driving time interruptions.
articles.desc_un_html: The navigation device works with daily updated maps that are specially designed for truck driving.   Driving bans, bridges, closures and other restrictions are taken into account.   In addition, the navigation device predicts the exact time of arrival - taking into account traffic jams and possible driving time interruptions.

articles.title: How do I report delays?
articles.description:
Delays are communicated directly to the customer, without further interfaces.  

You can simply report your delay at the push of a button and the customer is informed in real time. 

The customer can then give you appropriate feedback if there is a change - for example, a change of ramp - due to the delay.
articles.desc_un_html: Delays are communicated directly to the customer, without further interfaces.    You can simply report your delay at the push of a button and the customer is informed in real time.   The customer can then give you appropriate feedback if there is a change - for example, a change of ramp - due to the delay.

articles.title: How do I report problems during transport?
articles.description:
Problems are communicated directly to the customer, without any other interface.  

You can easily report your problem at the push of a button and the customer will be informed in real time. 

The customer can then give you feedback on how to proceed.
articles.desc_un_html: Problems are communicated directly to the customer, without any other interface.    You can easily report your problem at the push of a button and the customer will be informed in real time.   The customer can then give you feedback on how to proceed.

articles.title: Can I cancel orders?
articles.description:
You can cancel accepted orders no later than 48 hours before the deadline at the first loading point upon request. 

However, we reserve the right to propose a fee for the cancellation, especially if it occurs after the stated deadline.
articles.desc_un_html: You can cancel accepted orders no later than 48 hours before the deadline at the first loading point upon request.   However, we reserve the right to propose a fee for the cancellation, especially if it occurs after the stated deadline.

Also, make sure that there are no spaces between the numbers.     Your VAT ID is being checked by us, so it may take a moment before you are redirected to the next page.

articles.title: Are there any costs for the registration?
articles.description: No, registration is completely free of charge.
articles.desc_un_html: No, registration is completely free of charge.

articles.title: How do I register? - The initial registration
articles.description:
First, an initial registration takes place.


This is divided into the following steps:



1. Section details


 


  • Company name (mandatory field):

    Please enter your complete company name in this field.

    z. e.g. "Max Mustermann GmbH & Co. KG"


    First name (mandatory field):

    Please enter the first name of the person you want to register on the driveMybox platform, e.g. managing director, fleet manager, dispatcher, etc.


    Last name (mandatory field):

    Please enter in the appropriate last name.

    2. company address section




 


Address (required field):

Please enter your complete company address in this field.

z. e.g. "Max-Musterman-Allee 1, 22761 Hamburg".


Help in case of problems, if the corresponding address is not displayed:

Solution variant 1: First enter your company name in the address field and pay attention to the suggestions displayed afterwards.

Solution 2: First enter your city and then the company name.


If you receive the following error message: "Address is unknown or invalid", please note the following help:

- Is a house number given?

- Is this address listed on Google Maps?

- If these hints do not help, please contact driveMybox support at support@drivemybox.de. 




3. account details section



  1. E-mail address (mandatory field):

    Please enter in this field the email address you want to use for your driveMybox account.

    This address must be valid and must not already exist in our database.

    You will receive a verification code to unlock your account. Please make sure that the spelling is correct.


    Assistance in case of problems, if the corresponding e-mail address is not accepted:

    - The following error message will appear: "An account with the specified email address is already taken", this email has already been used for another registration process.

    - If this is your e-mail address and you have not specified it yourself before, please contact driveMybox support at support@drivemybox.de or check whether someone from your company has already used this e-mail address.

                    - You have used this e-mail address before in another registration attempt.

                    Then try to log in to your old account and continue the registration there

                    or use another e-mail address to start over now.


    Landline number (mandatory field):

    Please enter your landline number here. 


    Help in case of problems, if the corresponding phone number is not accepted:

                    The following error message will appear: "Please enter a valid landline number":

                    - Make sure you have selected the correct country code (e.g. +49 for

                    Germany)

                    - Please make sure that you use a valid area code, but WITHOUT the zero (0) at the beginning.

                    beginning

                    - You don't have a landline number at the moment? No problem! Alternatively you can enter your

                    cell phone number.


    Password (mandatory field):

    Please set your password here

    Please note the following:

    --> Your password must contain at least one upper case letter, one lower case letter and one number.


    Confirm new password (mandatory field):

    Please repeat in this field the password you just entered.

    Please make sure that the two passwords match.




    Section 4 Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy



  • Accept T&C (mandatory):

    Please confirm our T&Cs - click this link to access the T&CsAccept Privacy Policy (Mandatory):


        Accept Privacy Policy (Mandatory):

    Please confirm our privacy policy - click on this link to access the privacy policy.


    You will now receive - on the previously provided email address - a verification code!



    Verification code: 

     

    Please enter the code that was sent to the email address you provided. 


    If you did not receive an email, please follow the instructions below: 

    Please check your spam folder 

    Please check the email address in the given text 

    If the email address is correct, click on the "Resend" link. Note that it can sometimes take up to 10 minutes for the email to reach you. If you do not receive the email again, please contact driveMybox support at support@drivemybox.de.

    If the email address you entered is incorrect (misspelled/number), you will have to restart the registration process,

articles.title: How do I register? The Advanced Registration
articles.description:
This is followed by further registration.


This is divided into the following steps:



Tab 1: Book 


1st section: Company logo (optional)

Here you can optionally upload your company logo to complete your account.


2nd section: Company details 

 

Country code UST-ID: (mandatory field):

Please select the country code for your VAT ID.

Sales Tax ID (required field):





Country abbreviation UST-ID: (mandatory field)

VAT ID (mandatory field):


Please enter your sales tax ID here 

Help in case of problems, if you get the error message "VAT-ID is invalid": 

Solution variant 1: Enter the VAT-ID without the country abbreviation  

Solution variant 2: Enter the VAT-ID without the blank space 


If you still receive the above error message, please contact driveMybox support at support@drivemybox.de .

 

Legal form: (mandatory field):

Select the remaining form of the company from the drop-down menu.

The following legal forms are available:

AG

GbR

GmbH

GmbH & Co. KG

Sole proprietor

KG

OHG

Sole proprietor

UG

Other 


--> If none of the above options apply, please select "Other".  



 

Company profile (mandatory field):

Please select one of the following options from the list: 

Freight Forwarding

Intermodal

Shipper

Shipping company

Other



--> If none of the above options apply, please select "Other 

 

Mobile phone number(Optional) 

Here you can optionally enter a mobile phone number 

 

Company Website (Optional) 

Here you can optionally enter your company website 

  

 

 Tab 2: Payouts

 

Account details: 

 

Payment method: (Mandatory)


Please choose one of the options from the list

Credit card

IBAN 


Important: The payment method is a direct debit authorization. The money will be automatically collected after the completion of the performed booking.


Card or account holder: 


Please enter the first and last name of the account or or credit card holder here. 


Card or IBAN number 


Please enter the IBAN or credit card number from which the money will be collected. 

Please note the following assistance: 

IBAN:

Enter the IBAN with country abbreviation and without spaces.

Enter the IBAN number with country abbreviation and without spaces. 


Credit card:

Enter your card number + month (in numbers) + expiration date (last 2 years numbers)

all_folders.name: Order Processing
all_folders.description: All relevant info about the registration process for customers

articles.title: How can I place orders?
articles.description: You can simply click on "book" in your profile and the order entry screen will open immediately.
articles.desc_un_html: You can simply click on "book" in your profile and the order entry screen will open immediately.

articles.title: What information do I need to place an order?
articles.description:
To place an order, we need some information from you to process the order. 

 

Details for export orders: 

 

- Is it a full or empty container? 

- Is it customs or community goods? 

- Does the container have to be weighed? 

- Indication of the loading points  

- Specification of the loading numbers 

- Information about the shipowner and/or rail operator 

- Information about container size, container type and additional services 

- Date of presentation 

- net weight 

- Information about the country of origin and destination of the container 

- Information about the goods: packaging, quantity, description of goods 

 

Additional information for import orders: 

 

- Indication of the container number 

- Specification of the seal number 

 

You can also create orders, if you are missing data. These are then saved as "drafts".

You can then complete these drafts as soon as you have all the missing data.
articles.desc_un_html: To place an order, we need some information from you to process the order.      Details for export orders:      - Is it a full or empty container?   - Is it customs or community goods?   - Does the container have to be weighed?   - Indication of the loading points    - Specification of the loading numbers   - Information about the shipowner and/or rail operator   - Information about container size, container type and additional services   - Date of presentation   - net weight   - Information about the country of origin and destination of the container   - Information about the goods: packaging, quantity, description of goods      Additional information for import orders:      - Indication of the container number   - Specification of the seal number      You can also create orders, if you are missing data. These are then saved as "drafts".  You can then complete these drafts as soon as you have all the missing data.

articles.title: How to find a suitable driver for my order?
articles.description:
Based on the information in your order, a suitable driver is determined. 

Your order will be proposed only to the drivers who are the most suitable based on their skills.
articles.desc_un_html: Based on the information in your order, a suitable driver is determined.   Your order will be proposed only to the drivers who are the most suitable based on their skills.

articles.title: Do I have to issue a waybill?
articles.description:
No, we take care of that for you. 

The waybill is automatically created by us and provided digitally to you and the driver.
articles.desc_un_html: No, we take care of that for you.   The waybill is automatically created by us and provided digitally to you and the driver.

articles.title: Can I also have my orders processed in a climate-neutral way?
articles.description: Climate compensation is offered for all our transports, whereby CO2 emissions are offset.
articles.desc_un_html: Climate compensation is offered for all our transports, whereby CO2 emissions are offset.

articles.title: How is the transport price determined?
articles.description:
The amount of remuneration for the provision of transport and logistics services is determined according to a dynamic pricing algorithm, which takes into account the following parameters, among others: 

   

- Distance-dependent remuneration 

- Energy price developments 

- Supply and demand situation  

- Charges related to congestion at seaport and hinterland terminals 

- Toll charges
articles.desc_un_html: The amount of remuneration for the provision of transport and logistics services is determined according to a dynamic pricing algorithm, which takes into account the following parameters, among others:        - Distance-dependent remuneration   - Energy price developments   - Supply and demand situation    - Charges related to congestion at seaport and hinterland terminals   - Toll charges

articles.title: How far in advance can I place orders?
articles.description: You can book your orders at least 48 hours in advance.
articles.desc_un_html: You can book your orders at least 48 hours in advance.

articles.title: Who transports my orders?
articles.description:
Your orders will be transported by the carriers and self-driving contractors registered with us. 

All service providers are checked by us to ensure a high level of quality.
articles.desc_un_html: Your orders will be transported by the carriers and self-driving contractors registered with us.   All service providers are checked by us to ensure a high level of quality.

articles.title: How is the quality of the service providers ensured?
articles.description:
All service providers are checked for their competencies. 

Through our algorithm we can ensure that your order is handled only by the best service providers.
articles.desc_un_html: All service providers are checked for their competencies.   Through our algorithm we can ensure that your order is handled only by the best service providers.

articles.title: How does the handling of the transports work?
articles.description:
When a service provider has accepted an order, you will be informed immediately. 

As soon as the order is started by the driver, you can monitor the transport live and you will receive all status messages and information in real time.
articles.desc_un_html: When a service provider has accepted an order, you will be informed immediately.   As soon as the order is started by the driver, you can monitor the transport live and you will receive all status messages and information in real time.

articles.title: How can I monitor my transports?
articles.description:
As soon as a driver starts an order, you see this in your overview, you can follow live where the truck is and when it is expected to arrive at the next loading point.

where the truck is and when it is expected to arrive at the next loading point.
articles.desc_un_html: As soon as a driver starts an order, you see this in your overview, you can follow live where the truck is and when it is expected to arrive at the next loading point.  where the truck is and when it is expected to arrive at the next loading point.

articles.title: Will I be notified if there are any problems?
articles.description:
You will be informed immediately if there is a problem. 

For example, if a store number is missing, the driver can inform you in real time, so you can immediately react to this problem and tell the driver the new store number without much communication effort.
articles.desc_un_html: You will be informed immediately if there is a problem.   For example, if a store number is missing, the driver can inform you in real time, so you can immediately react to this problem and tell the driver the new store number without much communication effort.

articles.title: Can I cancel orders?
articles.description:
You can cancel placed orders at least 48 hours before the deadline at the first loading point after request. 

However, we reserve the right to propose a fee for the cancellation, especially if it occurs after the stated deadline.
articles.desc_un_html: You can cancel placed orders at least 48 hours before the deadline at the first loading point after request.   However, we reserve the right to propose a fee for the cancellation, especially if it occurs after the stated deadline.

articles.title: Who covers the costs for standing and waiting times?
articles.description:
• The included loading or unloading time per individual transport is 120 minutes (time budget included in the freight). The loading and unloading time always begins when the driver reports to the loading or unloading point and ends when the driver can leave the loading point.
  • 30 min before the end of the included waiting time, a notification is sent to point out potential waiting time.
  • The accrued waiting time can be checked in real time and is automatically noted and provided on the digital waybill.

Conditions and prices are only available for registered customers on the platform.
articles.desc_un_html: The included loading or unloading time per individual transport is 120 minutes (time budget included in the freight). The loading and unloading time always begins when the driver reports to the loading or unloading point and ends when the driver can leave the loading point.  30 min before the end of the included waiting time, a notification is sent to point out potential waiting time.  The accrued waiting time can be checked in real time and is automatically noted and provided on the digital waybill.   Conditions and prices are only available for registered customers on the platform.

articles.title: What is driveMybox?
articles.description: driveMybox is a digital all-in-one platform for container transport on the road.
articles.desc_un_html: driveMybox is a digital all-in-one platform for container transport on the road.

articles.title: What advantages does driveMybox offer me?
articles.description:
1. platform as a large network: 

Put your drivers behind the wheel and benefit from the network in the container business. 

 

2. easy registration: 

Register your company: Tell us for which regions you want to receive offers. 

 

3. capacity utilization: 

Our goal is to optimize your utilization, reduce empty runs and increase your revenues. 

 

4. automated processes: 

Benefit from automated processes and take care of the essentials. 

 

5. easy order management: 

Our platform allows you to process orders quickly and transparently. 

 

6. short payment terms: 

We take care of your billing with short payment terms. 

 

To see all the benefits, click here.

articles.title: What makes driveMybox different from others?
articles.description: Our offers are tailor-made and adapted to your needs. We are not a freight exchange.
articles.desc_un_html: Our offers are tailor-made and adapted to your needs. We are not a freight exchange.

articles.title: Are there any costs for using driveMybox?
articles.description: No. The use of driveMybox is completely free of charge.
articles.desc_un_html: No. The use of driveMybox is completely free of charge.

articles.title: Who are my contractual partners?
articles.description:
The contractual partner is driveMybox GmbH.

You can find more information under our General Terms and Conditions (GTC).
articles.desc_un_html: The contractual partner is driveMybox GmbH.  You can find more information under our General Terms and Conditions (GTC).

articles.title: How secure is my data with driveMybox?
articles.description: You can find our privacy policy here.
articles.desc_un_html: You can find our privacy policy here.

articles.title: How can I contact the support?
articles.description:
Non-registered users can use our contact form.


Registered users can use our chat function in their account.
articles.desc_un_html: Non-registered users can use our contact form.     Registered users can use our chat function in their account.

articles.title: How do I receive my remuneration?
articles.description: Your payment will be transferred to the specified bank account after order processing.
articles.desc_un_html: Your payment will be transferred to the specified bank account after order processing.

articles.title: How can I monitor my credit notes and incoming payments?
articles.description:
Via the dashboard in your profile, you have the possibility to monitor all incoming payments and outstanding credits at any time. 


We create an overview in real time, in which all payments can be monitored and analyzed.
articles.desc_un_html: Via the dashboard in your profile, you have the possibility to monitor all incoming payments and outstanding credits at any time.      We create an overview in real time, in which all payments can be monitored and analyzed.

articles.title: When can I reach driveMybox support?
articles.description: Our support is available on weekdays from 07:30 to 17:30. Outside of these hours, our driveMybot is always available for you via the chat function.
articles.desc_un_html: Our support is available on weekdays from 07:30 to 17:30. Outside of these hours, our driveMybot is always available for you via the chat function.

all_folders.name: Registration
all_folders.description: All relevant info about the registration process for trucking companies

articles.title: Where do I register?
articles.description: You can always register on our website.
articles.desc_un_html: You can always register on our website.

articles.title: How do I get feedback if my registration was successful?
articles.description:
After a successful registration you will receive a corresponding message that you have successfully registered.

You will be immediately in your created account. 

 

ATTENTION: Before you can accept your first order, we have to check your registration and your documents. You will receive feedback from us as soon as your account is activated.
articles.desc_un_html: After a successful registration you will receive a corresponding message that you have successfully registered.  You will be immediately in your created account.      ATTENTION: Before you can accept your first order, we have to check your registration and your documents. You will receive feedback from us as soon as your account is activated.

articles.title: When will my account be activated?
articles.description:
In order for you to accept your first order, we must first verify your registration and documents.  

We will do our best to complete this process as quickly as possible. Please note that this can take up to two business days.  

You will receive an email from us when the verification was successful and your account has been activated.
articles.desc_un_html: In order for you to accept your first order, we must first verify your registration and documents.    We will do our best to complete this process as quickly as possible. Please note that this can take up to two business days.    You will receive an email from us when the verification was successful and your account has been activated.

articles.title: Do I need to create a new account for each employee?
articles.description: No. One account can be used by multiple employees.
articles.desc_un_html: No. One account can be used by multiple employees.

articles.title: Do I have to create an account for each driver?
articles.description:
You can create your driver profiles during registration. Or later in the settings. 

For each driver you need to enter the mobile number that the driver uses. 

After a driver is fully created, he will immediately receive a notification via SMS to his mobile device.

This notification will also inform the driver where to download the app and how to register.
articles.desc_un_html: You can create your driver profiles during registration. Or later in the settings.   For each driver you need to enter the mobile number that the driver uses.   After a driver is fully created, he will immediately receive a notification via SMS to his mobile device.  This notification will also inform the driver where to download the app and how to register.

articles.title: How do I set up the app?
articles.description:
The app can be downloaded at any time from the Google Playstore (Android) or the Appstore (iOS). 

After the driver has logged in, the details that still need to be completed are requested. As soon as the driver has completed all the information, the app is ready for use.
articles.desc_un_html: The app can be downloaded at any time from the Google Playstore (Android) or the Appstore (iOS).   After the driver has logged in, the details that still need to be completed are requested. As soon as the driver has completed all the information, the app is ready for use.

articles.title: I have forgotten my password, what should I do?
articles.description:
You can reset your password here.   

 

Click on "Forgot password  


  
 

You will receive a code by email, enter this code in the field provided and set a new password for yourself.  

 
 
 

As soon as you click on "save", the new password will be assigned and you can log in again.
articles.desc_un_html: You can reset your password here.        Click on "Forgot password                 You will receive a code by email, enter this code in the field provided and set a new password for yourself.             As soon as you click on "save", the new password will be assigned and you can log in again.

articles.title: How do I change my password?
articles.description:
You can change your password at any time in your settings. 

 

1. click on "My profile 

2. set your new password 

3. click on "Save

articles.title: I uploaded the wrong document, can I change it?
articles.description:
During registration you can go back to point 4/5 and simply exchange or re-upload documents.


After registration, you can delete the wrong documents in your settings under "Documents" and upload them again. Here you can also maintain your documents at any time and keep up to date, should documents expire.

Here you can also maintain your documents at any time and keep up to date, should documents expire.

articles.title: I get an error message with the sales tax ID, what can I do?
articles.description:
Please make sure that the country code has been selected correctly.

In the field "VAT ID" only the number may be entered.

Also, make sure that there are no spaces between the numbers.


Your VAT ID is being checked by us, so it may take a moment before you are redirected to the next page.

Also, make sure that there are no spaces between the numbers.     Your VAT ID is being checked by us, so it may take a moment before you are redirected to the next page.

articles.title: Are there any costs for the registration?
articles.description: No, registration is completely free of charge.
articles.desc_un_html: No, registration is completely free of charge.

articles.title: What documents do I need for registration?
articles.description:
The following documents are required for registration:

  • Cargo liability insurance 
  • Business liability insurance 
  • Extract from the commercial register 
  • License according to freight traffic law 
  • Motor vehicle insurance


For your drivers you can optionally upload the following documents:

  • Valid identity card (front and back)
  • Valid driver's license (front and back)


Alternatively, these documents can also be uploaded separately by the driver via the app.


The files can be uploaded as a scan or simply photographed.

It is important that all required data is clearly visible, as the documents have to be checked by us.

The documents should be in the following format: PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, JPEG, PNG.


Special conditions apply to the following documents:

Valid identity card front and back

a) color image (8000 x 8000 pixels or smaller)

b) file size 10 MB or less

c) JPG or PNG format (no PDF!)

d) The name on the ID card must match the name on the registration form

e) country of issue must be the same as the company's registered office

f) validity date must be after the registration date


Extract from the Commercial Register

a) color image (8000 x 8000 pixels or smaller)

b) file size 10 MB or less

c) JPG or PNG format (no PDF!)

d) The company data in the commercial register excerpt (e.g. the address or VAT number) must be identical to the data specified in the registration process

e) validity date must be after the registration date

all_folders.name: Order Processing
all_folders.description: Info on order processing for trucking companies

articles.title: How do I receive orders via driveMybox?
articles.description:
You will receive offers automatically from us. 

You only have to enter the catchment area and the working hours for your drivers and we will plan for you. 

Based on the skills of the drivers and the information about the equipment, we look for tailor-made jobs for you or your drivers. 

All you have to do is decide which job you want to assign to your driver.
articles.desc_un_html: You will receive offers automatically from us.   You only have to enter the catchment area and the working hours for your drivers and we will plan for you.   Based on the skills of the drivers and the information about the equipment, we look for tailor-made jobs for you or your drivers.   All you have to do is decide which job you want to assign to your driver.

articles.title: How do I get transportation outside my catchment area?
articles.description:
You can enter an "additional catchment area". 

If a driver is on the road outside his usual catchment area on some days, you can always specify when he is where in order to be supplied with orders from us there as well.
articles.desc_un_html: You can enter an "additional catchment area".   If a driver is on the road outside his usual catchment area on some days, you can always specify when he is where in order to be supplied with orders from us there as well.

articles.title: What transports are offered through driveMybox?
articles.description: Via driveMybox container transportation by road is offered.
articles.desc_un_html: Via driveMybox container transportation by road is offered.

articles.title: Do I have to issue a waybill?
articles.description:
No, we take care of that for you. 

The waybill is automatically created by us and provided digitally to you and the driver.
articles.desc_un_html: No, we take care of that for you.   The waybill is automatically created by us and provided digitally to you and the driver.

articles.title: Can I also handle my transports in a climate-neutral way?
articles.description: Climate compensation is offered for all our transports, whereby CO2 emissions are offset.
articles.desc_un_html: Climate compensation is offered for all our transports, whereby CO2 emissions are offset.

articles.title: How is the transport price determined?
articles.description:
The amount of remuneration for the use of transport and logistics services is determined according to a dynamic pricing algorithm, which takes into account the following parameters, among others: 

   

- Distance-dependent remuneration 

- Energy price developments 

- Supply and demand situation  

- Charges related to congestion at seaport and hinterland terminals 

- Toll charges
articles.desc_un_html: The amount of remuneration for the use of transport and logistics services is determined according to a dynamic pricing algorithm, which takes into account the following parameters, among others:        - Distance-dependent remuneration   - Energy price developments   - Supply and demand situation    - Charges related to congestion at seaport and hinterland terminals   - Toll charges

articles.title: Who places the orders?
articles.description:
The orders are placed by the clients registered with us. 

All principals are screened by us to ensure a high level of quality. 

 

Principals can be forwarders, shipping companies, intermodal providers, wholesalers and shippers.
articles.desc_un_html: The orders are placed by the clients registered with us.   All principals are screened by us to ensure a high level of quality.      Principals can be forwarders, shipping companies, intermodal providers, wholesalers and shippers.

articles.title: How is the quality of shippers and loading points determined?
articles.description:
By digitally recording the orders, we can determine the exact waiting times. 

From registration to the end of loading/unloading, it is possible to tell you in advance whether you have to plan for waiting time for an order.
articles.desc_un_html: By digitally recording the orders, we can determine the exact waiting times.   From registration to the end of loading/unloading, it is possible to tell you in advance whether you have to plan for waiting time for an order.

articles.title: How do I benefit from evaluating shippers and loading points?
articles.description:
Through the ratings, you have a better overview of whether a loading station has fast processing times or not. So you can estimate in advance how long you actually need for the order. 

You also get information on how the driver is treated at the loading point. 

 

Additionally, you get information about the on-site facility, such as:. 

 

- Can the driver take his break on site and stay overnight? 

- Are sanitary facilities available on site?

- Can the driver get a coffee or something to eat on site?  

 

Based on these values you can determine whether you want to accept the job or not.
articles.desc_un_html: Through the ratings, you have a better overview of whether a loading station has fast processing times or not. So you can estimate in advance how long you actually need for the order.   You also get information on how the driver is treated at the loading point.      Additionally, you get information about the on-site facility, such as:.      - Can the driver take his break on site and stay overnight?   - Are sanitary facilities available on site?  - Can the driver get a coffee or something to eat on site?       Based on these values you can determine whether you want to accept the job or not.

articles.title: How does the handling of the transports work?
articles.description:
Once you have accepted an order, it will end up in both your schedule and the schedule of the driver you have designated for that order. 

To start an order, the driver simply has to click on the order and select "start trip". 

The navigation device will start automatically and navigate the driver to the first charging point. 

All further steps are self-explanatory and can be done with a few clicks.


If you still have questions, feel free to contact us via the contact form or chat.
articles.desc_un_html: Once you have accepted an order, it will end up in both your schedule and the schedule of the driver you have designated for that order.   To start an order, the driver simply has to click on the order and select "start trip".   The navigation device will start automatically and navigate the driver to the first charging point.   All further steps are self-explanatory and can be done with a few clicks.     If you still have questions, feel free to contact us via the contact form or chat.

articles.title: How can I monitor my transports?
articles.description:
You can track and trace the transports in real time. 

If you click on an order that has already been started by the driver, you can see exactly where he is and when his estimated time of arrival at the next loading point will be.

You will also see all the information that the driver has sent in addition to this transport.
articles.desc_un_html: You can track and trace the transports in real time.   If you click on an order that has already been started by the driver, you can see exactly where he is and when his estimated time of arrival at the next loading point will be.  You will also see all the information that the driver has sent in addition to this transport.

articles.title: How does the integrated navigation device work?
articles.description:
The navigation device works with daily updated maps that are specially designed for truck driving. 

Driving bans, bridges, closures and other restrictions are taken into account. 

In addition, the navigation device predicts the exact time of arrival, taking into account traffic jams and possible driving time interruptions.
articles.desc_un_html: The navigation device works with daily updated maps that are specially designed for truck driving.   Driving bans, bridges, closures and other restrictions are taken into account.   In addition, the navigation device predicts the exact time of arrival, taking into account traffic jams and possible driving time interruptions.

articles.title: How do I report delays?
articles.description:
Delays are communicated directly to the customer, without any other interface.  

You can simply press a button to report your delay and the customer will be informed in real time. 

The customer can then give you feedback if there is a change - for example, a change in the ramp - due to the delay.
articles.desc_un_html: Delays are communicated directly to the customer, without any other interface.    You can simply press a button to report your delay and the customer will be informed in real time.   The customer can then give you feedback if there is a change - for example, a change in the ramp - due to the delay.

articles.title: How do I report problems during transport?
articles.description:
Problems are communicated directly to the customer, without any other interface.  

You can easily report your problem at the push of a button and the customer will be informed in real time. 

The customer can then give you feedback on how to proceed.
articles.desc_un_html: Problems are communicated directly to the customer, without any other interface.    You can easily report your problem at the push of a button and the customer will be informed in real time.   The customer can then give you feedback on how to proceed.

articles.title: Can I cancel orders?
articles.description:
You can cancel accepted orders at least 48 hours before the deadline at the first loading point after request. 

However, we reserve the right to propose a fee for the cancellation, especially if it occurs after the stated deadline.
articles.desc_un_html: You can cancel accepted orders at least 48 hours before the deadline at the first loading point after request.   However, we reserve the right to propose a fee for the cancellation, especially if it occurs after the stated deadline.

articles.title: SOP TCHIBO
articles.description:
Kunde: TCHIBO GmbH

  • Kundentyp: Verlader
  • Vertragsart: Tender (Laufzeit: 01JAN2022-31DEZ2022)
  • Auftrag Input: durch dMb
  • Region: Hamburg
  • SOP-Owner: Franklin Birkle
  • Sales-Owner: Franklin Birkle


Ansprechpartner Kunde:

Operations: Rebekka Zander, Tel
Operations Lead: Alexander Heyen
Procurement: Tobias Reich
dMb-Account: Rebekka Zander

1. Allgemeiner Ablauf:

  1. Tchibo sendet Auftrag (="Freistellungsauftrag") ca. 2 Wochen vor Schiffsankunft an dMb (NKG+GTH + Reedereien sind in cc)
  2. Es gibt zwei Lagerhäuser
    1. NKG KALA, Hohe Schaar Kamp 3, Hamburg: Voll-Container werden abgekrant.
    2. GTH, Ewers XX: Voll-Container bleiben auf Chassis. Chassis werden abgesattelt
  3. Chargennummer = Kunden-Referenz
  4. Chargen müssen gesammelt gefahren werden, d.h. Container von Auftrag/Charge 2 dürfen erst angeliefert werden, wenn alle Container von Auftrag/Charge 1 abgeliefert wurden.
  5. Container einer Charge können gleichzeitig oder hintereinander angeliefert werden. D.h. der Fahrer kann Pendelverkehr einrichten.
  6. Container-Release erfolgt durch die jeweilige Reederei

2. Ablauf KALA:

  • Check-IN: Hohe-Schaar-Kamp 3, 21107 Hamburg
  • Anlieferung kann erfolgen: Montag-Freitag 24h, Samstag bis 0430h (3 Schichtsystem; Nachtanlieferungen sind willkommen, da weniger los).
  • Fahrzeug-Ausstattung: soll 20'Chassis sein, kann auch KombiChassis sein, aber muss zwingend heckbündig gestellt werden.
  • Entladereferenz: Keine oder Chargen-Nummer
  • Ablauf "Vollabgabe":
    • Fahrer meldet sich am Check-Point
    • Weiterfahrt zur Musterrampe
    • Muster wird entnommen. Fahrer bekommt "Containerkarte" und wartet auf Anweisung
    • Fahrer bekommt Anweisung Stellplatz anzufahren
    • Stacker-Fahrer krant Vollcontainer ab
    • Fahrer kann Gelände verlassen
    • (Auf Wunsch  kann Fahrer Leercontainer mitnehmen, wenn Container seitens NKG als "abholbereit" gemeldet wurde [siehe Ablauf "Leerabholung"]
  • Ablauf "Leerabholung":
    • NKG sendet per Email "Leermeldung" an dMb (OnlineZugang: NKG-Online ) dMb muss das Leerdepot in die NKG-Plattform eingeben (damit die Leercontainer in den jew. Depot-Block gestaut werden).
    • Leercontainer werden im Blockstau gelagert. Es ist unvorteilhaft für NKG wenn die Container nummerisch abgefordert werden.
    • Lange Standzeiten müssen daher tunlichst vermieden werden (Merke: dMb trägt die Detentionkosten nach der Freien Zeit).
    • dMb entnimmt die Anlieferreferenz und -depot der ReleaseOrder des Reeders.
    • Container können paarig gefahren werden


2. Abrechnung:

  • Leer- und Lastlauf müssen zusammen in Rechnung gestellt werden
  • Zahlungziel 30 Tage 
  • Anlieferung kann erfolgen: Montag-Freitag 24h, Samstag bis 0430h (3 Schichtsystem; Nachtanlieferungen sind willkommen, da weniger los).

Step 3: Use the template in your article

  • Explain the actions under this step

Test

Fahrer bekommt "Containerkarte" und wartet auf Anweisung  Fahrer bekommt Anweisung Stellplatz anzufahren  Stacker-Fahrer krant Vollcontainer ab  Fahrer kann Gelände verlassen  (Auf Wunsch  kann Fahrer Leercontainer mitnehmen, wenn Container seitens NKG als "abholbereit" gemeldet wurde [siehe Ablauf "Leerabholung"]    Ablauf "Leerabholung":  NKG sendet per Email "Leermeldung" an dMb (OnlineZugang: NKG-Online ) dMb muss das Leerdepot in die NKG-Plattform eingeben (damit die Leercontainer in den jew. Depot-Block gestaut werden).  Leercontainer werden im Blockstau gelagert. Es ist unvorteilhaft für NKG wenn die Container nummerisch abgefordert werden.  Lange Standzeiten müssen daher tunlichst vermieden werden (Merke: dMb trägt die Detentionkosten nach der Freien Zeit).  dMb entnimmt die Anlieferreferenz und -depot der ReleaseOrder des Reeders.  Container können paarig gefahren werden     3. Ablauf GTH:   xxxCheck-IN: Hohe-Schaar-Kamp 3, 21107 Hamburg  xxxAnlieferung kann erfolgen: Montag-Freitag 24h, Samstag bis 0430h (3 Schichtsystem; Nachtanlieferungen sind willkommen, da weniger los).  xxxFahrzeug-Ausstattung: soll 20'Chassis sein, kann auch KombiChassis sein, aber muss zwingend heckbündig gestellt werden.  xxxEntladereferenz: Keine oder Chargen-Nummer  xxxAblauf "Vollabgabe":  xxxx  , wenn Container seitens NKG als "abholbereit" gemeldet wurde [siehe Ablauf "Leerabholung"]    Ablauf "Leerabholung":  xxx     4. Abrechnung:   Leer- und Lastlauf müssen zusammen in Rechnung gestellt werden  Zahlungziel 30 Tage   Anlieferung kann erfolgen: Montag-Freitag 24h, Samstag bis 0430h (3 Schichtsystem; Nachtanlieferungen sind willkommen, da weniger los).   5. articles.title: INOFMAIL Aaron - Dienstleister  Urlaub
articles.description:
Moin Jungs,
 
anbei noch ein Paar Info zum aktuellen Ablauf im Trucking unserer Fahrer im Fernverkehr.
 
Planung der Fahrer – Fernverkehr (Enns, Waldemar Fischer, Artur Tarinski/Giuseppe Fahrer):
  • bei Touren > 500km immer alle 2 Tage planen. Heißt: eine lange Tour mit Gestellung am Tag 1 bedeutet erneute Gestellung im Inland am Tag 3 möglich.
  • Enns Fahrer versuchen zum Wochenende eine Tour nahe Ruhrgebiet zu planen bzw. mit der Option über das Ruhrgebiet fahren zu können
  • Kein IMO annehmen, Fahrer können dies nicht
  • Giuseppe (Artur Tarinski) hat ein Kühlchassis, kann aktive Reefer fahren
  • Als Hilfestellung mache ich mir immer eine Übersicht „Planung“ anbei
 
Planung der Fahrer – Nahverkehr (wie Vladi oder auch TT Transporte):
  • Umfuhren max 5 am Tag pro LKW
  • IMO/ADR nur Vladi
  • Schiffs ETA prüfen, max 48h Stunden vor Anlieferung in HH möglich, BHV Tage vor ETA Schiff
  • Mails HHLA beachten CTA,CTT,CTB Abfertigungsinformationen, hier schreibt die HHLA ab wann angeliefert werden kann. Bedeutet auch, ab diesem Zeitpunkt kann auch erst das Slot gebucht werden
 
 
Slot Buchung – Truckgate HH Hafen:
https://app.truckgate.de/trg/language
 
  • Slots müssen gebucht werden bei EUROGATE, CTA, BUKAI, CTT, EKOM, HCS Depot, VET Amt, CPA
  • Ausschließlich nur für Enns Fahrer unter app.truckgate (Kommunikation zentral über Gennadji Enns)
    • Fahrer: Markus ID 313003 – PIN 0610
    • Fahrer: Sven ID 137809 – PIN 1602
    • Fahrer: Willi ID 137433 - PIN 1403
    • Fahrer: Analtoni ID 313119 - PIN 2810 (optional, fährt gerade in Duisburg)
  • HINWEIS: Wenn es ein T1 Container ist (MRN vom Kunden) muss in der Slotbuchung die Packstückanzahl angegeben werden + Haken T1 gesetzt werden
 
Slot Buchung – Containerchain (Depot HH)
https://sso.containerchain.com/identity/login?signin=b8e65a4e04f57401165dcb88574b7ab0
Benutzer: supportdrivemybox.de
Passwort: dMb2021!
  • Slots müssen gebucht werden für die Depots CMR und CCIS in Hamburg
    • Einloggen, über das Depot hoovern, Anlieferung oder Abholung auswählen
    • Step 1: Schritte befolgen, Freistellref oder Containernummer je nach Abfrage eingeben
    • Step 2: Uhrzeit Auswählen
    • Step 3: Feld links neben Notizen klicken und Kennzeichen vom Fahrer eingeben und speichern
 
Generelle Infoseiten:
  • HHLA Coast Segelliste: https://coast.hhla.de/report?id=Standard-Report-Segelliste
    • Prüfen der Schiffsankünfte am CTA, CTB und CTT
  • HHLA Coast Containerinfo: h https://coast.hhla.de/containerauskunft
    • Prüfen Containerstatus am CTA, CTB und CTT ob greifbar oder nicht
    • Bei Abnahme wichtig das Freistellung „OK“, Container „gelöscht“ und der Verwahrstatus / Zllstatus passt.
      • Bei T1 Container muss es „941“ sein, „934“ heißt Zoll hat noch nicht überlassen, Kunde muss prüfen
      • Bei ATC Containern muss immer “941 oder 942“ sein
  • Infogate (alle EUROGATE Terminals HH, BHV, WHV https://www.eurogate.de/eportal/state/show?_state=tvh74nag6wvi&_unique=el13ax5yhl97&_transition=start
    • Segelliste
    • Containerauskunft
 
Zwischenlagerung Container
  • Oftmals können wir nicht in HH anliefern, hierfür lagern wir dann zwischen und planen eine erneute Anlieferung je nach ETA Schiff am Terminal
  • WICHTIG: Immer im Kundenaccount und Excel den Auftrag zusätzlich als „Hafentour / Umfuhr“ anlegen und buchen!!!!!!!!!!!!!
  • Optionen:
    • REMAIN, Dradenauer Deichweg (NICHT Tankfeld), hier haben wir 20 Container Kapa (nur normale Container KEIN IMO oder REEFER)
      • Mail an rm-ham-interchange@eurogate.eu
      • Containernumnmer, Größe und Gewicht angeben (siehe Mails „Lastlager“)
      • Kondition an Kunde: EUR 215,00 (20ft) EUR 275,00 (40ft) inkl. jeweils 3 Tage Lagerung, Handlings und Hafenumfuhr, EUR 20,00 je TEU pro Folgetag
    • CONDACO, Rethedamm oder Billstraße (Normale Container oder aktive REEFER)
      • Mail an Lisa und Lilly l.doebler@condaco.de, l.vilinska@condaco.de
      • Containernumnmer, Größe und Gewicht angeben und Fragen wo angeliefert werden soll
      • Kondition an Kunde: EUR 45,00 pro HUB, EUR 45,00 pro TEU und Lagertag, EUR 100,00 pro Tag wenn aktiver Reefer
    • EUROGATE, Containerterminal (Normale Container und auch ADR IMO Gefahrgut)
      • Mail an CTH Interchange interchange@eurogate.eu
      • A08/A09 Ausfüllen (Containernummer, Gewicht, Inhalt und Fahrer der Anliefrung abändern, bedeutet das Terminal benötigt die Kostenübernahme, sonst nehmen Sie den nicht an (Anbei Beispiele
      • Bei ADR Gefahgrut das DGD vom Fahrer mitsenden
      • Siehe Beispielmails „Zwischenlagerung A08“
      • Konditionen an Kunde: lt. Auslage Terminal
 
Kontakt Trucker:
Neben den Truckern die wir über die Plattform ansprechen können wir weiterhin noch einmal gesondert kontaktieren:
  • Contrail: M.Muhle@Contrail-Transport.de , auftrag@contrail-transport.de
Auftrag zuweisen, in den Account gehen und dann Per mail an Auftrag .. senden
  • Oiatrans (Christian Wagner, Matthias Behm): dispo@oiatrans-hamburg.de, c.wagner@oiatrans-hamburg.de Tel.: +49 40 334 656 962     
  • Beeken: Verteiler: order.wlhv@beeken-logistik.de Tel.: 044215061370  WHV Trucker Umfuhren
    • Beeken ist nicht registriert und will auch nicht. Geht nur im Notfall manuell.

articles.title: INFOMAIL - Kunde Arron Übergabe
articles.description:
anbei die Verteiler / Kontakte der Kunden, die uns auch gerne mal kurzfristig helfen. Ebenfalls ein paar Infos on Top:
 
JAS:
 
Account „ZF Team Hamburg“ Jas Hamburg
Rüdiger Bolz – TEL.:  +49 (40) 180492-470 Mail: ruediger.bolz@jas.com
  • Gestellort Murg & Krumbach (Export, Account UTT)
    • Kommt 1-2 x pro Woche
    • Entweder ab/bis BHV oder Leer ex Ulm/Stuttgart. Zahlt auch Rundlauf (siehe verganene Aufträge)
    • Template angelegt
 
Stefan Heyer – TEL.:  +49 (40) 180492-311 Mail: stefan.heyer@jas.com
  • Gestellort Hannover (Account Export, WABCO)
    • Kommt 2-3 x pro Woche immer Mi, Do oder FR (flexibel je nachdem wie wir können)
    • Entweder ab/bis BHV oder auch mal HH.
    • Template angelegt, PF Pricing, wenn leer HH Runde HH berechnen
 
Carlo Wulff – TEL.:  +49 (40) 180492-451 Mail: carlo.wulf@jas.com
  • Gestellort Aschaffenburg, Großostheim, Kolbaskowo Pohorelice (Account KION)
    • Volumen 10-20 Container pro Woche
    • Export auf Oneway Basis, mal Rundlauf wenn es nicht anders geht
    • Entweder ab/bis BHV oder Leer ex Frankfurt, Leipzig, Berlin. Zahlt auch Rundlauf (siehe verganene Aufträge)
    • Template angelegt
    • EAGLE hat hier schon ein paarmal gefahren, entweder via Nürnberg oder direkt
 
Robert Yeritsyan – TEL.:  +49 (40) 180492-409 Mail: robert.yeritsyan@jas.com
  • Gestellort Schweinfurt (Account ZF)

    • Export auf Oneway Basis, mal Rundlauf wenn es nicht anders geht
    • Entweder ab/bis BHV/HH oder Leer ex Frankfurt. Zahlt auch Rundlauf (siehe verganene Aufträge)
    • Template angelegt
    • EAGLE hat hier schon ein paarmal gefahren, entweder via Nürnberg oder direkt oder HH Trucker
 
Vivien Pleger – TEL.:  +49 (40) 180492-410 Mail: vivien.pleger@jas.com
  • Gestellort Hamburg (Account Eppendorf AG)
    • Volumen 3 Container pro Woche
    • Export HH, muss immer zwischengelagert werden Remain
 
 
Account „Thorben Thillmann“ Jas Düsseldorf
Dominic Bauermeister (Export) – TEL.:  +49 (2102) 7147-113 Mail: dominic.bauermeister@jas.com
Nele Brüggemann (Import) – TEL.:  +49 (2102) 7147-124 Mail: nele.brueggemann@jas.com
Dominick Thum  (Import) – TEL.:  +49 (2102) 7147-123 Mail: dominick.thum@jas.com
Thorben Thillmann (Teamleiter) – TEL.:  +49 (2102) 7147-116 Mail: thorben.thillmann@jas.com
 
  • Gestellort Edingen (IMPORT, VZ Trend Goods)
    • Schwankt bis zu 5 x pro Woche
    • Entweder ab/bis WHV oder HH. Oneway wird gewünscht und bezahlt, Im Zweifel aber auch die Runde
    • Template angelegt
  • Gestellort Malsch (IMPORT, Dachser)
    • Schwankt bis zu 5 x pro Woche
    • Immer ab/bis Hamburg. Oneway wird gewünscht und bezahlt (PF), Im Zweifel aber auch die Runde (EUR 2147,00 all in vereinbart)
    • Template angelegt
  • Gestellort Neu-Isenburg (IMPORT, JAS Hauptlager)
    • 1-2 x pro Woche
    • Entweder ab/bis WHV oder HH. Oneway wird gewünscht und bezahlt, Im Zweifel aber auch die Runde (PF)
    • Template angelegt
  • Gestellort Greven (IMPORT, HSE 24/DHL Lager)
    • Schwankt, Lots von bis zu 10x pro Woche
    • Entweder ab/bis WHV oder HH. Immer Rundlauf
    • Template angelegt
 
Account „Frau Zigic“ Jas Nürnberg
Nadine Frey (Import) – TEL.:  +49 (911) 81740-12 Mail: nadine.frey@jas.com
Michael Weigler (Teamleiter) – TEL.: +49 (911) 81740-12 Mail: nadine.frey@jas.com
Janine Ehemann (Import) – TEL.: +49 (911) 81740-35 Mail: janine.ehemann@jas.com
Ulrike Schwemmer (Import) – TEL.: +49 (911) 81740-41 Mail: ulrike.schwemmer@jas.com
 
  • Gestellort Nürnberg (IMPORT, MACMA)
    • Sporadisch (ist aber ein laufender Account
    • Oneway ab HH oder WHV, leer Nürnberg, Runde selten
    • Template angelegt
  • Gestellort „DIVERSE im Raum Nürnberg“
    • IMMER ansprechen
 
Account „JAS Forwarding“ Jas Bremen
Christian Fitting (Teamleiter) – TEL.:  +49 (421) 30166-48 Mail: christian.fitting@jas.com
Marcel Denker (Import) – TEL.:  +49 (421) 30166-29 Mail: marcel.denker@jas.com
Karina Wagner (Import) – TEL.:  +49 (421) 30166-39 Mail: karina.wagner@jas.com
 
  • Gestellort Schweinfurt (EXPORT, ZF)
    • Sporadisch (ist aber ein laufender Account)
    • Rundlauf ab Bremen BHV oder HH
    • Template angelegt
  • Diverse Gestellorte Norddeutschland und Ruhrgebiet (Karina Wagner)
 
 
Langhorst:
 
Account „Stephan Eckstein“
Verteiler: fernverkehr@langhorst.de
Tel.: 042152166-643
    • Buddy: Olaf Reinfrank (guter Mann, sehr zuverlässig)
    • Hat immer Überhänge ab den Nordhäfen, Rundläufe und auch Oneways
    • Fester Berechnungssatz = EUR 1,40 p. KM + 10% Diesel
    • Special Satz WZ = EUR 35,00 je halbe Stunde
    • Auf Containerart achten, 40 HCRF meist mit aktiver Kühlung (Chassis hat Giuseppe)
 
Contargo Truck:
 
Account „Olaf Smoczynsky“
Verteiler: trucking.crl-hamburg@contargo.net
Frank Jacobsen (Import Disposition) 040/2809725-23 - fjacobsen@contargo.net

  • Frank immer gerne ansprechen

    • Fester Berechnungssatz = EUR 1,40 p. KM + 15% Diesel

DHL Hamburg:
 
Account „Thomas Rogmann“
Verteiler: dhl-de-icc-nord@dhl.com
  • Immer gerne Tilo Schmitter oder Thomas Rogmann fragen
    • Gerne Kapa anbieten, sie schauen dann
